name: rdn
description: Syntax highlighting, diagnostics, and smart completions for RDN files â€” a JSON superset with dates, BigInts, regex, binary, Maps, Sets, tuples, and more.

rdn.useExplicitMapKeyword.description: Keep the explicit Map keyword on non-empty maps (e.g. Map{ k => v }). When false, non-empty maps are formatted as implicit ({ k => v }).

rdn.useExplicitSetKeyword.description: Keep the explicit Set keyword on non-empty sets (e.g. Set{ 1, 2 }). When false, non-empty sets are formatted as implicit ({ 1, 2 }).

rdn.hover.enabled.description: Enable hover information for RDN-specific literals.

rdn.hover.dateTime.enabled.description: Show hover info for DateTime, date-only, and Unix timestamp literals.

rdn.hover.dateTime.fullFormat.description: Date format for full ISO 8601 DateTime values (e.g. @2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z). Supports tokens: YYYY, MM, DD, HH, mm, ss, SSS, etc.

rdn.hover.dateTime.noMillisFormat.description: Date format for DateTime values without milliseconds.

rdn.hover.dateTime.unixFormat.description: Date format for Unix timestamp hover display.

rdn.hover.timeOnly.enabled.description: Show hover info for TimeOnly literals (@14:30:00).

rdn.hover.timeOnly.format.description: Time format for TimeOnly hover display.

rdn.hover.duration.enabled.description: Show hover info for Duration literals (@P1Y2M3DT4H5M6S).

rdn.hover.bigint.enabled.description: Show hover info for BigInt literals (42n).

rdn.hover.bigint.showBitLength.description: Show the bit length of BigInt values in hover.

rdn.hover.binary.enabled.description: Show hover info for binary literals (b"..." and x"...").

rdn.hover.binary.showPreview.description: Show ASCII preview of binary data when all bytes are printable.

rdn.hover.regexp.enabled.description: Show hover info for RegExp literals.

rdn.hover.specialNumbers.enabled.description: Show hover info for NaN, Infinity, and -Infinity.

rdn.hover.collections.enabled.description: Show hover info for Map, Set, and Tuple collections.

rdn.hover.diagnostics.enabled.description: Show diagnostic hints in hover tooltips (e.g. BigInt fits in Number, odd hex digits, ambiguous Unix timestamps).
